verbose_text: Importantly, APPPS1 mice also performed poorly compared to APPPS1xP2X7Rko mice (P < 0.025), and no differences were observed between WT and APPPS1xP2X7Rko mice (P> 0.766), emphasizing that P2X7R deficiency rescued the cognitive decline of APPPS1 mice.
evidence: P2X7R deficiency rescued the cognitive decline of APPPS1
